casebody.data:
NUSSBAUM, Appellant, v. WEBER, Respondent. (City Court of New York,

General Term.

May 26, 1899.) Action by Frank Nussbaum against Adolph Weber. From a judgment on a verdict in plaintiff’s favor, and from an order denying a new trial, plaintiff appeals. Affirmed. Thomas F. Crain, for appellant. Robert L. Redfield, for respondent. PER CURIAM.

Judgment and order appealed from affirmed, with costs.
